Description: Hovnanian Enterprises Inc., a national residential homebuilder, agreed to pay a $1 million civil penalty to resolve alleged Clean Water Act violations at 591 construction sites in 18 states and the District of Columbia.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department

Description: Hovnanian Enterprises, Inc. and PulteGroup, Inc. have agreed to pay civil penalties of $130,000 and $56,000 respectively in separate settlements with EPA resolving alleged Clean Water Act violations at construction sites in Maryland and Virginia.

Description: Hovnanian Enterprises Inc., a national residential homebuilder, agreed to pay a $1 million civil penalty to Maryland, Virginia, West Virginia, the District of Columbia and the federal government to resolve alleged Clean Water Act violations at 591 construction sites. The settlement was also announced by the U.S. Justice Department; see the Violation Tracker entry at https://violationtracker.goodjobsfirst.org/violation-tracker/-hovnanian-enterprises-inc

Agency: California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation

Company: K. Hovnanian Four Seasons at Historic Virginia, LLC
